messages.content: ComfyUI-MagicAnimate is a custom node that allows users to easily use Magic Animate within ComfyUI.
ComfyUI-MagicAnimate can be installed either automatically via the ComfyUI-Manager or manually by cloning the GitHub repository and installing the required packages.
What are the node types available in ComfyUI-MagicAnimate?
The node types available in ComfyUI-MagicAnimate are MagicAnimateModelLoader and MagicAnimate.
What does the MagicAnimateModelLoader node do?
The MagicAnimateModelLoader node loads the MagicAnimate model.
What does the MagicAnimate node do?
The MagicAnimate node uses the MagicAnimate model to animate an input image using an input DeepPose video and outputs the generated video.
What is an example workflow for ComfyUI-MagicAnimate?
An example workflow for ComfyUI-MagicAnimate is animating any person's image with a DeepPose video input. The workflow graph and sample output can be found in the provided links.
What has been fixed in the ComfyUI-MagicAnimate custom node?
The white color issue in the output has been fixed in the ComfyUI-MagicAnimate custom node, thanks to the contribution of @mingqizhang.
What has been optimized in the ComfyUI-MagicAnimate custom node?
The amount of models downloaded has been optimized in the ComfyUI-MagicAnimate custom node. It now requires only 15GB and downloads only the models needed.
